p:
Molecular docking was executed using AutoDock4.2 software [ 28]. Lamarckian Genetic Algorithm was used for performing molecular docking studies and the docking parameters were chosen from our previously defined protocol [ 21]. A total number of fifty independent docking runs were performed for each compound. The conformational clustering of the poses was performed by considering a root mean square deviation (RMSD) of <2.0 Å. The most favourable binding poses of the compounds were analyzed by choosing the lowest free energy of binding (ΔG) and the lowest inhibition constant (K i) which is calculated using the following equation (Eq. (1)):
(1)
K i
= exponential
∆G / RT
where ∆G is the binding energy in kcal/mol, R is the universal gas constant (1.987 calK −1 mol −1) and T is the temperature (298.15 K).
